content: the classical attitude poncho 1 design is beautiful and simple made from cotton kings color bomb which is a luscious and soft cake-yarn available in fabulous colour combinations **materials ** - crochet hook g 4 0 mm - approx 250g cotton kings color bomb 2 or hobbii twister 3 **size ** one size **finished measurements ** length from neck to point on the front approx 25 from the neck to the edge of sleeve approx 18 1⁄2 **gauge ** 4 x 4 = 21 sts x 10 row **abbreviations ** **chain** chain **st** stitch **single_crochet** single_crochet **half_double_crochet** half_double_crochet **double_crochet** double_crochet **treble_crochet** treble_crochet 1 https //hobbii com/classical-attitude-poncho-adult utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=classical-attitude-poncho&utm_term=swr 2 https //hobbii com/cotton-kings-color-bomb utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=ck-color-bomb&utm_term=swr 3 https //hobbii com/hobbii-twister utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=twister&utm_term=swr
